com.amazon.speech.speechlet.interfaces.playbackcontroller

Interface PlaybackController


  • public interface PlaybackController
    The interface for interacting with remote controller devices that can control Alexa-enabled devices.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SpeechletResponse onNextCommandIssued(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<NextCommandIssuedRequest> requestEnvelope)
      Entry point for a user pressing the next button on a playback controller.
      SpeechletResponse onPauseCommandIssued(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PauseCommandIssuedRequest> requestEnvelope)
      Entry point for a user pressing the pause button on a playback controller.
      SpeechletResponse onPlayCommandIssued(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlayCommandIssuedRequest> requestEnvelope)
      Entry point for a user pressing the play button on a playback controller.
      SpeechletResponse onPreviousCommandIssued(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PreviousCommandIssuedRequest> requestEnvelope)
      Entry point for a user pressing the previous button on a playback controller.

    • Method Detail

      • onNextCommandIssued

        SpeechletResponse onNextCommandIssued(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<NextCommandIssuedRequest> requestEnvelope)
        Entry point for a user pressing the next button on a playback controller.
        Parameters:
        requestEnvelope - the request envelope containing the next command issued request to handle
        Returns:
        the response to the request. The response may only contain AudioPlayer directives.

      • onPauseCommandIssued

        SpeechletResponse onPauseCommandIssued(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PauseCommandIssuedRequest> requestEnvelope)
        Entry point for a user pressing the pause button on a playback controller.
        Parameters:
        requestEnvelope - the request envelope containing the pause command issued request to handle
        Returns:
        the response to the request. The response may only contain AudioPlayer directives.

      • onPlayCommandIssued

        SpeechletResponse onPlayCommandIssued(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlayCommandIssuedRequest> requestEnvelope)
        Entry point for a user pressing the play button on a playback controller.
        Parameters:
        requestEnvelope - the request envelope containing the play command issued request to handle
        Returns:
        the response to the request. The response may only contain AudioPlayer directives.

      • onPreviousCommandIssued

        SpeechletResponse onPreviousCommandIssued(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PreviousCommandIssuedRequest> requestEnvelope)
        Entry point for a user pressing the previous button on a playback controller.
        Parameters:
        requestEnvelope - the request envelope containing the previous command issued request to handle
        Returns:
        the response to the request. The response may only contain AudioPlayer directives.
